metadata.synopsis: AD dialog after Kerri spawns next to the destroyed portrait, says a one liner and teleports to oskar, leaving players in the atelier, having to hurry to save oskar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Attacking the portrait having equipeped Location: CTY_Main_A -258; 34; -43

1.speaker: Kerri Evenfield
1.text: What is it, Oskar? I thought you wanted to see me again...
1.context: NodeContext: Threatening him, toying with him - about to attack

0.speaker: Lady Jannath
0.context: NodeContext: Terrified, trying to defend her husband
